EmailTemplate.subject: THANK YOU for joining NCR at BPAMA 2022!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We enjoyed getting to see you at the BPAMA Convention & Business Expo and hope you had a chance to see our demo of our cutting-edge self-checkout solution. As the global leader in self-checkout, we help you deliver an exceptional self-service experience with high adoption rates since it’s so easy to use. Customers want more convenience, especially when they’re ready to leave the store. Not only does self-checkout help free up your staff, but it can also reduce checkout lines and limit direct contact between your customers and associates.
